attributes.action: We want a zebra crossing - at Percy Park Road, Tynemouth
attributes.additional_details:
We wish to campaign a zebra crossing at Percy Park Road.
This will calm the traffic on Percy Park Road and increase the safety of the children accessing the school nearby.
The area is highly residential. Every morning hundreds of children and their parents cross the street to get access to the school.
There is heavy traffic on this road, often driving at higher speeds which may lead to an accident.
